channel.title: Xss on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Xss on TLDRBins

item.title: Connection from Public Internet
item.description: Simply catch HTTP request webhook.site Catch HTTP request and host a web server serveo.net # Start a local HTTP server python3 -m http.server 3000 # Redirect http request to localhost:3000 ssh -R 80:localhost:3000 serveo.net ngrok Download ngrok ngrok http 80 Note: ngrok free will show a warning message and require user accpet to proceed Note: Not good for XSS
